channel.title: Comments on: Seven years old today

item.title: By: Paul Mooney
item.dc:creator: Paul Mooney
item.description: <p>Seven years? Was the interweb thingy about back then, or did you just write on paper and post on street corners</p>
item.content:encoded: Seven years? Was the interweb thingy about back then, or did you just write on paper and post on street corners

item.title: By: Richard Shergold
item.dc:creator: Richard Shergold
item.description: <p>I've been reading for seven years too - can't believe its been that long <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: I’ve been reading for seven years too – can’t believe its been that long http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

item.title: By: Vitor Pereira
item.dc:creator: Vitor Pereira
item.description: <p>Happy birthday 11tmr.com!<br />Can't believe I've been reading your babble for seven years <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /><br /><br /></p>
item.content:encoded:
Happy birthday 11tmr.com!
Can’t believe I’ve been reading your babble for seven years http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif“ />
